title: Patient Care Practical Skills Enhancement: Science Education Pedagogy Intensive Workshop—Activity-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theory and experience in experimental design
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Evaluate the ability to design activity-centered instruction based on science education theories
Develop at least three hands-on teaching strategies that enhance learner engagement
Complete a mini-science lesson plan incorporating peer feedback

Learners produce one type of mobile-optimized digital educational material (infographics, videos, quizzes) meeting the following criteria: 1) mobile-optimized layout, 2) inclusion of three or more interactive elements, 3) content duration under five minutes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
